title: Kill as we go
creator_credit: George E. Hughes, Australian National Film Board and Ace Films
brief_description: Motor vehicles are a necessary part of Australian life - but they can kill. All road users should be educated to help reduce the road toll. Sponsored by the Australian Road Safety Council.
